title: gOpAlanE deivamAm
sahitya:
gOpAlanE deivamAm gOkulam vaLar


anupallavi

  pApa samhAranAm abat-bAndhavanAm


caraNam    samsAramenum pEralaiyAzhiyil tAzhndiDAdaruLa dayAkaranAm kamsAri murAri shrI narahari
 sanakAdi munivar amarum tozhum malart-tALan rAdhai bhAmai rukmiNi maNALan draupadik-karuL
 parama dayALan yamunaiyil varum koDiya kALingan muDi tanil gELi naTam puriyum
